creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly acquired by the Center with the kind assistance of Carol Brooks and Prof. James Cahill in honor of George Schlenker
description: snow scene with mountain in background and solitary tree in foreground; on left in middlegroud is a figure on a horse and one figure walking behind

medium: Hanging scroll; ink and light color on paper
title: Winter Landscape, after a Yuan Master
